question: (halal or haram) The product "Henna Natural Hair Colour" from the bodyshop. The ingredients are lawsonia, inermis, curcumalonga, sesamumindicum.
answer:
QUESTION
My question is whether the below product can be used or not The Description says: Henna powders have returned! For outstanding condition and Shine, 100% natural henna has been conditioning hair for centuries without any Of the complex chemicals found in modern artifical colourants. This shrub was First discovered in North Africa and the Near East, and it's long-lasting rich, Deep tones gave natural body and shine to Egyptioan Queens and Persian Bridesmaids for over 1,000 years. The choice of colors are: raging red, bewitching brown, red brown, charismatic copper
ANSWER


Share:
We do not know the details of the ingredients of the henna product listed by you.

However, from the description it appears that all the ingredients are natural. If so, it will be permissible to use the described henna product.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
